body_html:
I installed the preview version of PyTorch.
Then, I confirmed that the script works well in the following environment.
Thank you!

body:
I installed the preview version of PyTorch.
Then, I confirmed that the script works well in the following environment.
Thank you!

Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 1.0.0.dev20181121
Is debug build: No
